string-array.name: monk_power1
string-array.item: When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die
When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die and add the Magic trait
When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die and add the Magic trait and the Fire trait

string-array.name: monk_power2
string-array.item: You may play any number of blessings on your combat check; recharge them instead of discarding them.
